dialog:
BUY THE
WHITE
CRYSTAL
IN THIS
TOWN.

THE WHITE
CRYSTAL
CAN REVEAL
HIDDEN
THINGS.

THE CURSE
IS SLOWLY
CONSUMING
OUR LAND.

I HAVE LIVED
HERE FOR
OVER SIXTY
YEARS.

YOU ARE NOT
WELCOME
HERE,
BELMONT!

THE BELMONT
FAMILY HELP,
BUT BROUGHT
THIS CURSE.

THE WHITE
CRYSTAL
SHOWS
WHAT WAS
VEILED.

THE CURSE
HAS MADE
OUR LIVES
A NIGHTMARE.

I REMEMBER
WHEN THIS
TOWN WAS
PROSPEROUS.

YOUR ARRIVAL
BRINGS MORE
TROUBLE,
BELMONT.

DO NOT TRUST
THE VILLAGERS.
MANY ARE
WITH DRACULA.

THE PRIEST
AT CHURCH
IS A SPY FOR
DRACULA.

OUR MAYOR IS
INSANE! HE
CLAIMS TO
SEE DRACULA.

THE BAKER
SLIPS POISON
INTO HIS
BREAD FOR
DRACULA.

EVEN THE
LIVESTOCK
WHISPER
ABOUT
BLOODLUST.

SOMETHING IS
WRONG WITH
THE BLACKSMITH.
HE SMILES
TOO MUCH.

THEY LAUGH
WHEN YOU'RE
GONE. THEY
WATCH YOU.

SECRETS LURK
IN EVERY
CORNER. EVEN
CHILDREN ARE
INVOLVED.

DRACULA'S
POWER DRIVES
THEM CRAZY.
STAY ALERT.

THE TAVERN
OWNER OFFERS
DRINKS WITH
DRACULA'S
TOUCH.
